author.name: Sam Turnbull • It Doesn't Taste Like Chicken

description: What the smoky tastes of a BBQ in a hot sandwich? Toss this sandwich together in no time for the perfect hearty meal.
name: BBQ Black Bean Sandwich
recipeIngredient: 1 19oz can black beans (2 cups), (drained and rinsed)
1/4 cup vegan BBQ sauce, ( plus more for drizzling)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. When hot add in the onions and garlic and sauté for about 5 minutes until the onions turn translucent and begin to brown. Add the black beans, BBQ sauce, and salt and pepper. Heat through.
Pile the beans on bread, toast, or a tortilla, garnish with cilantro, then drizzle a little extra BBQ sauce on top.
